column5: Terry Fox started his run across Canada.
One of the best men this country has ever produced.

There was an incredible story on TSN a while back about Terry's relationship with Jay Triano (Raptors head coach). They met at Simon Fraser University out West and became great friends. Terry had just recently lost his leg and was starting to talk about running across Canada. On his journey, many years later, Terry Fox went off the straightest route to vist Jay Triano in Niagra Falls. Terry Fox asked Jay for his autograph and even listed Jay as one of his heros. Now that is a tribute to ones character.  Here is the link to watch the video but it is not working at the moment.Terry and Jay
Both his name, and his legacy will continue on forever. He touched the soul of humanity
He definitely woke the world! Running while fighting the "sister" Sarcoma to what Jennifer is battling right now.
wow !!!! i cant believe its been that long...
